# Installing quarto and Basic Markdown syntax

## General step
- install the quarto from browser
- Add extension with the vs code 

## Basic Markdown 
### Headings & Text Formatting
Headings Syntax:
# Heading 1
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
#### And so on

### Bold & Italic:
**Nitrogen**, **_Potassium_**

### Lists
Bullet list:
- Nitrogen
- Phosphorus
- Potassium

### Numbered list:
1. Test soil
2. Apply fertilizer
3. Measure growth

### Links, Images & Code
#### Link:
[Google](https://google.com)
#### Image:
![Soil Diagram](bon.jpg)
[^1]
#### Inline code:
This is a `{python} print("Python")` code.


### Blockquotes & Equations
#### Blockquote:
>Soil health is the foundation of crop productivity.
#### Equations (LaTeX style)
•	Inline: $Y = a + bX$
•	Block:
$$
Y = a + bX
$$
